# Description

Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed.

- [ ] New Feature (Agent, UI, or API)
- [ ] Bug Fix
- [ ] Refactor

# Checklist:

- [ ] My code follows the **Modular Monolith** structure (Agents isolated from API)
- [ ] I have verified that my changes do not break the **Live Camera** or **GPS Lock** constraints
- [ ] I have tested the **Agent Pipeline** flow locally (if applicable)
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in complex AI logic areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
